extendedInfo.description: Please note: We understand your concerns and assure you that your information is only used to make your CIBC Mobile Banking experience an even better one. Learn more about the app permissions at www.cibc.com/mobilepermissions.The CIBC Mobile BankingÂ® App for Android has been completely redesigned. Now optimized for all 4.x Android devices, including tablets,  the crisp design is enhanced with new features to make your mobile banking experience easier. Assign a picture to your saved card for a personalized touch, and favourite your most-used bank account to make transactions faster, like paying bills in fewer steps.There is also a new slide-out menu that allows for easy navigation, so you can always find what youâre looking for. FEATURES: Check balances Check account balances on all of your eligible CIBC products. Review transaction history Review details of your transaction history for up to 7 years for deposit, credit cards and other eligible credit accounts. Your running balance is shown on your deposit accounts to help you keep track of your spending.Review upcoming transactions Upcoming transactions, including bill payments and transfers, are available for review and cancellation if necessary in an easy-to-read calendar view.Easy bill paymentsPay your bills now or schedule a post-dated payment on your registered bills. Set up new payees in addition to those already existing in Online Banking. Transfers fundsTransfer funds between your eligible CIBC accounts. Send an INTERAC e-Transferâ¢1 to anyone on your existing recipient list or create new recipients using CIBC Mobile Banking.LocatorSearch or use the built-in GPS to find nearby branches, bank machines and CIBC Mortgage Advisors.ENROLMENT: As long as you're currently enrolled in CIBC Online Banking, you can use the same card number, password and personal verification questions to sign on to CIBC Mobile Banking.SECURITY: You can be reassured that your privacy and security is protected with the CIBC Online Security Guarantee.LEGAL:Although CIBC will not charge any fees in addition to your service plan to access mobile banking, additional service fees may be charged by your service provider. Check with your service or hardware provider if you have questions about your specific device.*When adding e-Transfer recipients, the App can access information from your contact list to fill in the required recipient information. At no time is that contact list data transmitted or shared with CIBC.Please note: the new enhanced Android experience is only available on devices that use Android 4.x software and above. However, the previous version of CIBC Mobile Banking will still support Android users who are using older Android software.Â® Trademark of CIBC.â¢1 Trademark of INTERAC Inc.; CIBC authorized user of mark.LANGUAGES:EnglishFrenchwww.cibc.com

reviews.title: Improved but has bug
reviews.comment: Good improvement but all the transaction dates are a day behind when they actually occured...and my pending transactions are all a day behind when they are really going to occur as per setup on my pc.
reviews.author: Shannon Awrey

reviews.title: Finally! Very good
reviews.comment: This is the App I\'ve been waiting for. It\'s native app so it is fast and the design is very clean.
reviews.author: Yongwan Shin

reviews.title: Better
reviews.comment: it has become so much better then before, one thing that is missing is a print button like what iOS has
reviews.author: Emanuel Esteves

reviews.title: Functional and like the new design
reviews.comment: All your basic banking needs will be met with this app! I love the new design and how it shows where each expense was processed.
reviews.author: Duane Louis

reviews.title: It works. Does everything I need it to do.
reviews.comment: The new design is good and it does everything I need with no bugs that I\'ve found.
reviews.author: Darshan OBrien

reviews.title: Finally a proper app!
reviews.comment: Glad that the web app is gone and a native app is here, at that a better one than the original iPhone app! Thanks CIBC!
reviews.author: Chris Todorov

reviews.title: Error in accessing credit
reviews.comment: Whenever I click on my credit card acct, the app responds that it encountered an internal error and to contact CIBC by phone...  Lost a star...
reviews.author: Jason Popesku

reviews.title: Great after update
reviews.comment: Since the latest update this app is phenomenal. No crashes yet and a great new interface. Remembering card Number works for me. Samsung Galaxy SIII
reviews.author: Connor S

reviews.title: Before today\'s update
reviews.comment: Before today I was able to have two cards saved on the application and login to with accounts at separate times. All info was saved and cards were nicknamed. After today\'s update I have lost all card information AND the ability to store two cards. First card logs in and is named without a hitch. Second card hits glitch and will not allow me to login. Hope there\'s a fix soon.
reviews.author: Rizwan Javeri

reviews.title: Awful - 0 stars
reviews.comment: Left panel doesn\'t work at all.  What a complete waste of time.
reviews.author: Tim Teece

reviews.title: Has gotten a lot better
reviews.comment: This app used to be overly simplistic, but this recent update seems to have done wonders.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice work!!
reviews.comment: Very slick but needs more features.
reviews.author: Ricardo Pontes

reviews.title: Clumsy
reviews.comment: This has always been a clumsy app but now it\'s even worse. It won\'t shut down after I use it. I spend the whole day restarting it and shutting it down.
reviews.author: Obadiah Michael Creek

reviews.title: It\'s good and it\'s bad
reviews.comment: Incredibly slowler with the new update. However I love the functionally of it
reviews.author: Brad Dehnke

reviews.title: Quite intrusive
reviews.comment: App is okay. But why does a banking app need permission to be able to use my camera, contacts list, etc...feel that the developers have unnecessarily asked for way too many permissions from users of the app and can easily exploit anyone\'s phones as users dont have a choice to NOT allow access to specific parts of their phone if they want to be able to use mobile banking. Other similar apps from (eg. RBC) doesn\'t ask so many permissions at all!
reviews.author: Ankit B.

reviews.title: O.O.
reviews.comment: Problems with app, there is a limit on the amount of characters allowed for the password, and I can\'t log in because of this.  I\'ll have to change my password in order to log in.  PLEASE FIX THIS!!!
reviews.author: Oli Olson

reviews.title: Timing you out to soon
reviews.comment: Do not give enough time, kick you out in 2 minutes, do not update you personal information. Please fix the problem.
reviews.author: Pe Gu

reviews.title: This app wants access to everything on your phone
reviews.comment: Access to storage, access to make calls, access to your contacts...  I use mobile banking to check balances and make payments.  Not to make new friends, spam my contacts, or download stuff to my microSD card.  Why does a banking app need to know who my contacts are?  Get your priorities straight and clean up this bloated insecure POS.  The older, less intrusive version was better.
reviews.author: Chris Taylor
